entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TitleView inside a NavigationPage has a top margin when page has UseSafeArea="False" #28293
  • Catalyst Device Tests are broken from [HybridWebView] Properly managed response streams #28285
    .NET 9 SR5
  • CollectionView RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand fires on initial data load #28279
  • Both methods have similar logic for creating an InMemoryRandomAccessStream, could we refactor it creating a helper method? #28274
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Getting exception while adding more views for scroll view. #28266
  • CollectionView inside invisible StackLayout doesn't show on iOS #28263

Closed

  • Re-enable PushingNavigationPageModallyWithShellShowsToolbarCorrectly test (flaky) on Catalyst #28271
    Backlog
  • [testing] Unit tests failing on main #28275
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Image is not loading in RadioButton (RadioButton.Content) in .NET Maui for .NET 9 SDK #28253
  • Blank target links no longer works on iOS 18 in BlazorWebView #25602
    .NET 9 SR6
  • CollectionView on Tabbed Page crashes on Android #27844
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Build is failing when it doest find Simulator #28227
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • AppCompatEditText#Background#SetTint affects other instances #28247
    Backlog
  • CollectionView footer disappear unexpectedly #17437
  • [Bug][Android]The IsEnable property of the Picker does not work #18035
  • Double border in MacOS and iOS #20556
  • ScrollView Orientation="Horizontal" RTL ios ​​not working In .NET 8 Maui #18883
  • HybridWebView crashing every time in Windows now with 9.0.40 update #27953
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [Bug] iOS: On-Demand Resource Tag not available to be set #28260
  • Returning back from navigation to My Recipes page would result in a blank screen. #28098
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Keyboard Overlay Issue: Input Fields Hidden Behind Native Keyboard in Hybrid WebView App #28083
  • Performance of navigation between two pages in a MAUI Shell app is really very poor. Taking more than 4-5 secs to navigate to a page #19605
  • No ProcessTerminated on iOS when WebView dies and turns blank #28088

PullRequests

Created

  • [net10.0] Remove mobile librarybuilder net9 #28290
    area-infrastructure, dependencies, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [HybridWebView] Always complete web requests #28286
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix NullReferenceException in PaintExtensions.IsSolid on Android (#28116) #28284
    .NET 9 SR4.1
  • Fix SafeArea management on iOS #28283
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Refactored similar methods on Windows HybridWebView #28282
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [Android] TabbedPage in FlyoutPage in navigationPage does not fit all screen - 2 #28281
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [Windows] Fix for Label Not Vertically Centered with MinimumHeightRequest #28270
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 5 #28269
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5

Merged

  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Update preview2 ios android sdk #28287
  • Add attempt number to failed builds #28280
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix incorrect MAC Image #28265
    area-testing
  • Patch in a temporary location #28278
  • Remove pending TODOs in .NET10 #28267
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Replace deprecated iOS OpenUrl #28160
    area-blazor, .NET 9 SR6
  • Don't throw on cleanup for CI with template tests #28248
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] [net10.0] Move iOS 18.0 simulators #28277
  • [net10.0] Move iOS 18.0 simulators #28273
    area-testing, testing-infrastructure, testing-green-ci, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Update with final preview2 versions #28231
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [HybridWebView] Properly managed response streams #28230
    area-blazor, p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • Update MauiPreviousDotNetReleasedVersion to 9.0.14 #28251
  • [Revert] [iOS] CollectionView with grouped data crashes on iOS when the groups change - fix #28246
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, .NET 9 SR5

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • WebView2CompositionControl support for BlazorWebView #28063 #28104
    area-blazor, community ✨
  • [HybridWebView] Refactor and convert the HybridWebView.js file into a TypeScript file #27183
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Visual state change for disabled RadioButton #23471
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed the picker title's color #23075
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Remove PlatformWrapperView.java setHasShadow #28245
    t/breaking 💥, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android] Custom shell back button color #22940
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [.Net10] Make IsVisibleCore and RefreshIsVisibleProperty visible #28139
    t/breaking 💥, area-architecture, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Make GraphicsViewHandler.MapBackground public #28243
    t/breaking 💥, area-drawing, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fix/workaround iOS stuck device tests #28196
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Improve iOS CollectionView performance by leveraging the new platform level invalidation mechanism #28225
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR6
  • fix-27998 - [Windows] ScrollView is not scrolling to the bottom if in grid with *,auto Width #28258
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨, layout-grid, area-controls-scrollview
  • Make HybridWebViewHandler throw JS exceptions in C# by default #28086
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 5 #28193
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 2 #28058
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [net10.0] Enable trimmer warnings #28015
    t/app-size, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [NET10.0] Annotate `ListStringTypeConverter` for nullability #28244
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [net10.0] Update net10.0 preview3 #28228
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android] Image is not loading in RadioButton - fix #28254
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix for Try scrolling down and when new items are added the first item does not kept in the displayed list. #27153
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Picker Selected item gets cleared in BindableLayout - Fix #26777
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 SR6
  • Skip useless handler mappings calls while connecting #27259
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Improvement] Add ReturnType API for SearchBar #24906
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android] TabbedPage in FlyoutPage in navigationPage does not fit all screen #22836
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Fixed ScrollView inside a Grid expands width past device screen when Rotated #27839
    community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix ImageButton Padding the third #25223
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] DatePicker not respecting UserAppTheme - fix #28256
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 3 #28103
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Label Visibility Issue on macOS and iOS #28081
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Moved ImageDoesNotLeak test case from Device Test to UI Test #28223
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [NET10.0] Fix parameter name for `ScrollViewerExtensions.UpdateScrollBarVisibility` #28255
    community ✨
  • Fixed - Grouped CollectionView items not rendered properly on Android, works on Windows #27847
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed the OneWayBinding issue with MultiBindingConverter on Slider and Stepper Value #28219
    area-xaml, platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-stepper, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the Label not sized correctly on Android #28215
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 19 #28060
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the Label text is cropped inside the border control with a specific padding value on certain Android devices #28259
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-controls-border, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed crash in CollectionView on iOS when updating grouped data. #28133
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] Fixed flickering when navigating using GoToAsync #28159
    area-navigation, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix: OnIdiom Default Value Handling for ValueType Properties #28257
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • Fixed FlyoutMenu icon issue when clearing and adding items #28241
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Flyout Menu Icon disappears from Window Title Bar after Navigation #28240
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows]Fix NullReferenceException in OpenReadAsync for FileResult created with full path #28238
    platform/windows 🪟, area-essentials, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the Label height within VerticalStackLayout is truncated when width is set #25748
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix Path Rendering Issue Inside StackLayout When Margin Is Set #28071
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix 24214 [Windows] IconImageSource as StreamImageSource of ContentPage in TabbedPage doesn't display #28127
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
